thread.title: Dad Gets Shot in Face by Armed Robber, Manages to Return Fire and Save Family
thread.title_full: Dad Gets Shot in Face by Armed Robber, Manages to Return Fire and Save Family

author: Kim Smith
title: Dad Gets Shot in Face by Armed Robber, Manages to Return Fire and Save Family
text:
73-Year-Old “Ticked Off” When Punk Puts Gun to His Head, Teaches Thug Brutal Lesson 
The other suspect fled the scene. 
“There was a struggle between the 27-year-old homeowner and these two males. One of the perpetrators did shoot the homeowner two times, in his mouth and his leg,” Chief Inspector Scott Small told KYW-TV. 
The Philadelphia Inquirer reported that the homeowner was in serious condition at Hahnemann Hospital. Advertisement - story continues below 
The mother had been upstairs putting to bed their four young daughters, who were between the ages of 5 months and 4 years. Luckily none of them were hurt during the exchange of fire. 
“He’s going to survive, but he has a long recovery road ahead of him,” a friend and coworker of the mother, who did not wish to be identified, told the Inquirer. 
Fox News reported that investigators said 11 shots were fired between the father and the suspects. 
The colleague added that the couple had just celebrated the birth of a daughter months ago. Advertisement - story continues below
